metadata.title: CVE-2019-8331 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Bootstrap before 3.4.1 and 4.3.x before 4.3.1, XSS is possible in thetooltip or popover data-template attribute.

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
twitter-bootstrap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
